Title: Trojan Horse
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Dan Dietz, Erik Mountain, Sean Hennen (story editor), Erik Mountain (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Michael Emerson
Plot: Finch goes undercover at a tech company to watch a rising VP. The company appears to be riddled with agents who are a front for something more sinister. Shaw reappears and takes an interest in Root. HR decides to rub out an informant.
